videos.title: "Mangalore, Karnataka "
videos.description: "Mushraf, 16 yr old student was just standing outside his college Matha Education Center waiting for bus, immediately a bunch of police came & attacked him mercilessly."

videos.title: Turning a peaceful protest into a violent one
videos.description: Charging lathis at the protestors

videos.title: Police damaging property by themselves
videos.description: Damaging things by throwing brick

videos.title: Police use blows to the head on protestors (the usual method is blows to the legs)
videos.description: Jama Masjid protestors suffer head injuries after being hit on the head

videos.title: Darya Ganj street in Delhi
videos.description: The protestors are water cannoned and lathi charged

videos.title: The police literally quoting the PM on “we know what they look like” to randomly pick up someone who looks Muslim
videos.description: "Police taking hold of a skullcapped man and later quotes Modi by saying ""Kapdo se pehchane jayege"""

videos.title: Students at AMU have needed medical amputation of arms/limbs
videos.description: Protestors are being attacked by lathis and tear gas. The attack has left many students severely injured

videos.title: Children being held and beaten with belts by the police
videos.description: Juveniles beaten up at the Daryaganj police station

videos.title: "This happened a few minutes back in Daryaganj, Delhi."
videos.description: "The police is chasing protestors and beating them in the streets of Daryaganj, New delhi"

videos.title: "7pm, Jama Masjid - Sound on, please. Hear the sound the lathis make when they hit a minor, hear the cops shout “Maaro, maaro”. This is just horrifying."
videos.description: Police hitting a minor with lathis

videos.title: "CT Ravi, Karnataka BJP, threatening protestors with another Godhra"

videos.title: A “The Hindu” journalist arrested in UP or no reason because he was Kashmiri
videos.description: Journalist Omar Rashid and Robin Verma arrested and assaulted by the police on suspecting that they were a part of the protest and on the basis that Rashid was a Kashmiri

videos.title: Woman school teacher arrested and beaten brutally
